params._rewardToken: Address of the reward token contract

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.details: Required by IERC721Receiver to accept NFT transfers

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.rewardRate: Reward rate per second (0 to use default)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

allContractsAllowed().notice: Whether all contracts are allowed (if false, use allowlist)

allowedContracts(address).notice: Whether a specific NFT contract is allowed for staking

claimAllRewards().notice: Claim rewards for all staked NFTs of the caller

claimRewards(uint256).notice: Claim rewards for a specific staked NFT

contractRewardRates(address).notice: Custom reward rates for specific NFT contracts

defaultRewardRate().notice: Default reward rate per second per NFT (in wei)

getPendingRewards(uint256).notice: Get pending rewards for a staked NFT

getUserStakedNFTs(address).notice: Get all staked NFTs for a user

getUserTotalPendingRewards(address).notice: Get total pending rewards for a user

nftToStakedId(address,uint256).notice: Mapping from NFT contract + token ID to staked NFT ID

setAllContractsAllowed(bool).notice: Set whether all contracts are allowed (owner only)

setContractAllowed(address,bool).notice: Set whether a specific contract is allowed (owner only)

setContractRewardRate(address,uint256).notice: Set reward rate for a specific NFT contract (owner only)

setDefaultRewardRate(uint256).notice: Set the default reward rate (owner only)

stakeNFT(address,uint256).notice: Stake an NFT to earn rewards

stakedNFTs(uint256).notice: Mapping from staked NFT ID to staked NFT info

unstakeNFT(uint256).notice: Unstake an NFT and claim pending rewards

userStakedNFTs(address,uint256).notice: Mapping from user to their staked NFT IDs
